en.about-title: I'm an Engineer, Maker, and Writer
about-description: Hey! Thank you for visiting my site. I'm Luis üòÉ.
About 12 years ago, I launched my first blog, sharing tech tutorials, which interested me in HTML and CSS. At that time, I had no idea that this decision would significantly shape my life.
Since then, I've been privileged to work as a Software Engineer at Intel, consult for various small businesses, and embark on independent projects.
At Intel, I currently work as a Site Reliability Engineer, focusing on developing and maintaining distributed systems at scale.
As a consultant, I've helped various small businesses, especially in web design and marketing. For example, I recently handled the design and email marketing for bysharonfonseca.com.

I'm passionate about creating meaningful products; luckily, my wife feels the same. Together, we've worked on several projects. Our newest project, Pulpo, aims to help the Hispanic community. We're focused on creating tools and resources to boost their career development.

As you can see, I'm passionate about tech, startups, and continuous growth. That's why I created this site and blog: to document and share what I learn and to provide tools and resources that enhance professional skills and foster personal growth.
Please feel free to reach out! Happy to connect!
